generatedTitle: Portrayal of Piggy in "Lord of the Flies" Film Adaptations

extractFactDictList.question: Who played Piggy in the 1963 film adaptation of Lord of the Flies?
extractFactDictList.sentence: In the 1963 film adaptation, Piggy was played by Hugh Edwards.

extractFactDictList.question: Who portrayed Piggy in the 1990 film adaptation of Lord of the Flies?
extractFactDictList.sentence: In the 1990 film adaptation, the character was portrayed by Danuel Pipoly.
